TextView.android:text: Acharya Nagarjuna University is situated between the cities of Vijayawada and Guntur in Andhra Pradesh on Calcutta and Chennai National Highway (NH-5). Its campus is spread over an area of 293 acres. Besides the campus college, it has one University Postgraduate centres - of Ongole (Prakasam Dt.). Its affiliational jurisdiction extends over the two districts of Guntur and Prakasam of Andhra Pradesh.
